languages.text: {n}Лицо Ардженты бледно как полотно, глаза прикрыты, губы чуть подрагивают, выдыхая слова молитвы. Она едва обращает внимание на внешний мир.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Лицо Ардженты бледно как полотно, глаза прикрыты, губы чуть подрагивают, выдыхая слова молитвы. Она едва обращает внимание на внешний мир.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta's face is as white as a sheet and her eyes are half-closed. Her lips tremble slightly as she whispers a prayer. She seems to be oblivious to the world around her.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо Ардженты бледно как полотно, глаза прикрыты, губы чуть подрагивают, выдыхая слова молитвы. Она едва обращает внимание на внешний мир.{/n}

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta tiene la cara blanca como el papel y los ojos entornados. Sus labios tiemblan ligeramente mientras musita una plegaria. Parece estar completamente ausente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's face is as white as a sheet and her eyes are half-closed. Her lips tremble slightly as she whispers a prayer. She seems to be oblivious to the world around her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta tiene la cara blanca como el papel y los ojos entornados. Sus labios tiemblan ligeramente mientras musita una plegaria. Parece estar completamente ausente.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタの顔はシーツのように真っ白で、目は半分閉じられている。祈りを囁くたびに、彼女の唇はかすかに震える。自分の世界に浸りきっているようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's face is as white as a sheet and her eyes are half-closed. Her lips tremble slightly as she whispers a prayer. She seems to be oblivious to the world around her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタの顔はシーツのように真っ白で、目は半分閉じられている。祈りを囁くたびに、彼女の唇はかすかに震える。自分の世界に浸りきっているようだ。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔的脸色白得像床单一样，眼睛半闭着。她低声祈祷着，嘴唇微微颤抖，似乎对周围世界的变化浑然不觉。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's face is as white as a sheet and her eyes are half-closed. Her lips tremble slightly as she whispers a prayer. She seems to be oblivious to the world around her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔的脸色白得像床单一样，眼睛半闭着。她低声祈祷着，嘴唇微微颤抖，似乎对周围世界的变化浑然不觉。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le visage d'Argenta est blanc comme un linge, ses yeux sont mi-clos et ses lèvres tremblent légèrement tandis qu'elle murmure une prière sans se soucier de ce qui l'entoure.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's face is as white as a sheet and her eyes are half-closed. Her lips tremble slightly as she whispers a prayer. She seems to be oblivious to the world around her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage d'Argenta est blanc comme un linge, ses yeux sont mi-clos et ses lèvres tremblent légèrement tandis qu'elle murmure une prière sans se soucier de ce qui l'entoure.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argentas Gesicht ist weiß wie ein Laken, ihre Augen sind halb geschlossen. Mit zittrigen Lippen flüstert sie ein Gebet. Sie scheint die Welt um sich herum gar nicht wahrzunehmen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta's face is as white as a sheet and her eyes are half-closed. Her lips tremble slightly as she whispers a prayer. She seems to be oblivious to the world around her.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Argentas Gesicht ist weiß wie ein Laken, ihre Augen sind halb geschlossen. Mit zittrigen Lippen flüstert sie ein Gebet. Sie scheint die Welt um sich herum gar nicht wahrzunehmen.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta'nın beti benzi atmış, gözleri kısık bakıyor. Duasını okurken dudakları titriyor. Etrafında olan bitenden bihaber sanki.{/n}
